description.p: Your patron gifts you a magical stone to bolsters your inner power. Choose a gem related to your patron. You can use this Trinket as a spellcasting focus and fuse it into any of your weapon, rod, staff or wand making it an object of the stone and a spellcasting focus for you. The stone itself or the infused object grants you a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws. If you loose this stone, you cannot cast any Spells above 2nd level. You can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive it back, it vanishes from it's current location and returns back to you. The ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and it destroys the previous stone. The Stone disappears in a flash of colored light when you die.
